source.csh: (cd ocean_BGC && git remote add yc https://github.com/yichengt900/ocean_BGC.git && git fetch yc && git checkout yc/$(OCEAN_BGC_GIT_TAG)) git clone -b dev/gfdl https://github.com/NOAA-GFDL/MOM6-examples.git mom6 pushd mom6 git checkout $(MOM6_GIT_TAG) git submodule update --recursive --init src/MOM6 src/SIS2 src/icebergs #git submodule update --recursive --init src/MOM6 src/SIS2 src/icebergs src/Icepack src/coupler src/atmos_null src/land_null src/ice_param if ("$(MOM6_GIT_FIX)" != "") then (cd src/MOM6 && git remote add esmg https://github.com/ESMG/MOM6.git && git fetch esmg && git checkout esmg/$(MOM6_GIT_FIX)) #(cd src/MOM6 && git checkout $(MOM6_GIT_FIX)) endif if ("$(SIS2_GIT_FIX)" != "") then (cd src/SIS2 && git remote add esmg https://github.com/ESMG/SIS2.git && git fetch esmg && git checkout esmg/$(SIS2_GIT_FIX)) #(cd src/SIS2 && git checkout $(SIS2_GIT_FIX)) endif (cd src; git clone https://github.com/CICE-Consortium/Icepack) if ("$(Icepack_GIT_FIX)" != "") then (cd src/Icepack && git checkout $(Icepack_GIT_FIX)) endif popd

input.namelist: months = $months days = $days current_date = 1993,1,1,0,0,0 hours = 0 minutes = 0 seconds = 0 calendar = 'gregorian' dt_cpld = 1800 dt_atmos = 1800 do_atmos = .false. do_land = .false. do_ice = .true. do_ocean = .true. atmos_npes = 0, ocean_npes = 0, concurrent = .false. use_lag_fluxes = .false. atmos_nthreads = $atm_threads ocean_nthreads = $ocn_threads do_chksum = .false.

max_files = 600 flush_nc_files=.false. max_axes = 400 max_num_axis_sets = 600, max_input_fields = 2000 max_output_fields = 5000 mix_snapshot_average_fields=.false.

verbose = .false. verbose_hrs = 24 traj_sample_hrs = 24 debug = .false. really_debug = .false. use_slow_find = .true. add_weight_to_ocean = .true. passive_mode = .false. generate_test_icebergs = .false. speed_limit = 0. use_roundoff_fix = .true. make_calving_reproduce = .true.
